void iGeom_getRootSet ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
iBase_EntitySetHandle *  root_set,
int *  err 
)

Get handle of the root set for this instance.

Get handle of the root set for this instance. All geom in this instance can be accessed from this set.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iGeom instance handle
root_set  [out] Pointer to set handle returned from function
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)

void iGeom_load ( iGeom_Instance  instance,
const char *  name,
const char *  options,
int *  err,
int  name_len,
int  options_len 
)

Load a geom from a file.

Load a geom from a file. If entity set is specified, loaded geom is added to that set; specify zero if that is not desired.

Parameters:
instance  [in] iGeom instance handle
name  [in] File name from which geom is to be loaded
options  [in] Pointer to implementation-specific options string
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
name_len  [in] Length of the file name character string
options_len  [in] Length of the options character string
Note:
entity_set_handle Set to which loaded geom will be added, zero if not desired

iGeom_Instance *  instance_out,
int *  err,
int  options_len 
)

Construct a new iGeom instance.

Construct a new iGeom instance, using implementation-specific options

Parameters:
options  [in] Pointer to implementation-specific options string
instance_out  [out] Pointer to iGeom instance handle returned from function
err  [out] Returned Error status (see iBase_ErrorType)
options_len  [in] Length of the character string pointed to by options
